welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fort Lee, a charming city known for its breathtaking views and historical significance. We invite you to explore our city and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to many major airlines, including Air France and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is currently under construction and will serve both domestic and international flights once completed.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the largest at JFK and serves a variety of domestic and international airlines, including Delta and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by JetBlue for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves a variety of international airlines, including British Airways and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights and is home to American Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
